entries.abort: We're not going to make it without you!
entries.arrival_phase_1: The distress signal is coming from deep within the Tyyyn nebula. You'd better hurry!
entries.arrival_phase_2: I've located the transport! Dock with the transport and use your ship power to jump-start their repair system.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: pcontrast1 Hostile fighters on attack vector!
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: pcontrast1 Hostile forces eliminated.
entries.autorewardbody: We are so very thankful that you were able to save yet another civilian transport. Such bravery!
entries.complete: Fantastic! The civilians are repaired and underway to their final destinations. Good job!
entries.docking_complete: The transport has taken power from your ship to start its repair system!
entries.docking_started: Perfect! As soon as you're docked, the transport will draw power from your ship.
entries.failed_destroy: No! No! The transport has been destroyed!
entries.panic_2: We can't take much more of this!
entries.quest_dock_d: The civilian transport needs a power-boost to restart its internal repair systems. Dock with the starship so they can begin the exchange.
entries.quest_dock_t: Dock with the Civilian Transport to transfer power
entries.quest_escort_d: The civilian transport is powered up and ready to continue its journey. Escort it to the Kashyyyk space station so that it can make a safe jump to hyperspace.
entries.quest_escort_t: Escort the Civilian Transport to the Kashyyyk space station
entries.quest_location_d: Fly to the depths of the Tyyyn nebula in the Kashyyyk system. The Ghrag have snared another civilian transport here!
entries.rescue_abandoned: No! We're not going to make it!
entries.rescue_phase_1: We need power to restart our repair system. We'll take it from your ship when you dock with us!
entries.rescue_phase_2: Thanks! Our repair system is fully-charged!
entries.taunt_2: Step aside pilot! This prize is mine!
entries.taunt_3: What are you? Rebel? Imperial? Who cares?! You die now!
entries.taunt_5: You will not survive this fight!
entries.thanks_2: Oh yeah! More of that, please!
entries.thanks_3: That's it! That's the way you do it!
entries.thanks_4: Yee-ha! That was one in a million!
entries.thanks_5: Teach those mercenaries a lesson they won't soon forget!
entries.title: The Ghrag Strike Again!
entries.title_d: Although you succeeded in frustrating the Ghrag mercenaries by rescuing that civilian transport - you also succeeded in making them very vengeful. They have gone after yet another civilian transport. Save it while there's still time!
